title: Mr. Amar Belani receives the ambassador of Greece in Algeria
text: The Secretary General of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and National Community Abroad, Mr. Amar Belani, received the Ambassador of the Hellenic Republic in Algeria, Mr. Georgios Zacharioudakis.
During this meeting, the two parties reviewed the bilateral relations and the ways and means to strengthen cooperation between Algeria and Greece in all areas of common interest.

The meeting also allowed to discuss the upcoming bilateral meetings, and to emphasize the importance of working together to meet all the conditions necessary for their success, with a view to strengthening relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries.
